Customer Reviews Section.Layout: Grid layout with multiple columns, featuring individual review blocks.
Customer Reviews Section.Design: Clean and organized design with a top-aligned section title. Each review block contains reviewer details, rating stars, and a text review.

Key Elements.Review Blocks: Each block comprises a reviewer's name, review date, rating stars, and review text.
Key Elements.Grid System: Responsive grid adapting to different screen sizes (2 columns for small screens, 3 columns for medium screens).
Key Elements.Rating Stars: Visual representation of the review rating using star icons.

Customer Reviews Section.Use Cases: Ideal for displaying customer feedback or testimonials on product pages, service websites, or company landing pages to build credibility and trust with potential customers.
